title: ICAI Announces Mock Test Papers Series I & II for CA Final May 2026 Exams
content:
# ICAI Announces Mock Test Papers Series I & II for CA Final May 2026 Exams

Hello CA Aspirants! Ek important update hai. The Institute of Chartered Accountants of India (ICAI), through its Board of Studies (Academic), ne CA Final May 2026 Examinations ke liye Mock Test Papers (MTP) Series I aur Series II announce kar diye hain. This initiative aims to provide students with crucial practice and help them prepare effectively for the upcoming exams.

Here are the key details you need to know:

*   **What:** Mock Test Papers Series I & II for CA Final May 2026 Examinations.
*   **Purpose:** These MTPs are designed to simulate the actual exam environment, helping students assess their preparation, manage time, and identify areas for improvement.
*   **Schedule:**
    *   **MTP Series I** will be conducted from March 16, 2026, to March 27, 2026.
    *   **MTP Series II** will follow, starting from April 1, 2026, to April 13, 2026.
    *   Both series will cover all six CA Final papers.
*   **Mode of Conduct:** The mock tests will be held in both physical and virtual modes.
    *   Students preferring the physical mode can approach their respective ICAI Branches/Regional Offices for registration.
*   **Access to Papers & Solutions:** Question Papers and their Suggested Answers will be available for download on the ICAI Board of Studies (BoS) Knowledge Portal (`https://boslive.icai.org/`) and the ICAI BoS Mobile App.

Students are strongly advised to attempt these mock test papers seriously to get a real feel of the examination and boost their confidence.

## Read the Official Document
*   [Download the Official Notification/Circular here](https://www.icai.org/post.html?post_id=14181)

*Published on: 27 January 2026*
